com.matrixone.apps.domain.util
Class i18nNow

java.lang.Object
  com.matrixone.apps.domain.util.i18nNow

public class i18nNow
extends java.lang.Object

This class take a string reource key and returns a localizaed strings in a JSP page.

getAdminDescriptionI18NString

public static java.lang.String getAdminDescriptionI18NString(java.lang.String adminNameStr,
                                                             java.lang.String adminTypeStr,
                                                             java.lang.String languageStr)
                                                      throws MatrixException
This function Get the I18N Translated Description for the Admin Objects In String Resource Properties file key should be defined as Syntax: emxFramework.Description.= Admin Description Translated e.g. emxFramework.GroupDescription.Company_Name= Description of Company Name

Parameters:
adminNameStr - Name of the Admin Object
adminTypeStr - Type of the Admin Object
languageStr - the language string
Returns:
String - translated value for the string
Throws:
MatrixException - if the operation fails
Since:
AEF 9.5.1.1
